entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 11:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
